title: Justin Kaplan (ed.) - The Pocket Aristotle (pdf)
description:
Justin Kaplan (ed.) - The Pocket Aristotle (Washington Square Press, 1958). 381 pages.

New scan. Searchable pdf (clearscan) with contents in bookmarks, accurate pagination and metadata, etc.


Introductory collection of Aristotle's writings.

Edited and with an introduction and prefatory notes by Justin D. Kaplan. Includes selections from The Physics, Politics, Metaphysics, Nicomachean Ethics, Psychology, and Poetics.

About the Editor

Justin Kaplan is the author of Mr. Clemens and Mark Twain, which was awarded a Pulitzer Prize and a National Book Award, and of Walt Whitman: A Life, which won the American Book Award. He is a member of the American Academy and Institute of Arts and Letters. He lives in Cambridge, Massachusetts, with his wife, novelist Anne Bernays.
